select project_id, card_num, name, responsible, category, budget, department, status, start_time, end_time from t_h_project where status = 0
and project_id like concat('%',#{param.projectId},'%')
and card_num like concat('%',#{param.cardNum},'%')
and name like concat('%',#{param.name},'%')
and responsible like concat('%',#{param.responsible},'%')
and category like concat('%',#{param.category},'%')
and department like concat('%',#{param.department},'%')
select YEAR(start_time) AS year, COUNT(*) AS count from t_h_project where status = 0 GROUP BY YEAR(start_time);
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS count FROM t_h_project WHERE status = 0 AND YEAR (start_time) = YEAR (CURDATE()) GROUP BY YEAR (start_time), category;
